original: 廣漢郪人，劉璋下屬。才學聞名州郡，便連荊襄士人都知曉其人，劉璋仰慕其名，聘請他出仕。常常規勸劉璋，曾勸諫劉璋提防馬超狼子野心，不可與之結盟。
text: Guanghan Qi, a subordinate of Liu Zhang. His talents are well-known in the prefectures and counties, and even the Jingxiang scholars know him. Liu Zhang admires his name and hires him to serve. Routinely persuade Liu Zhang, once persuaded Liu Zhang to beware of Ma Chao's wolf ambition and not to form an alliance with him.
